name: iThink Group  / StoryCub
tag_list: books, childrens-books, video, kids-video-books, storybooks, swerdlick, children, fairy-tales, kids, kids-stories, kids-books, kids-picture, beginning, readers, homeschooling, home-schooling, online-books, illustrated-books, video-books, digital, authors
overview:
The iThink Group is a creation lab specializing in the development and distribution of children’s educational and entertainment content for digital platforms.

They also produce in-house content, including “StoryCub” The program work with publishers and authors to create video versions of children’s picture books.

Covering many subjects, these “video stories” are a great marketing tool for companies and organizations trying to reach parents of young children, and are available for licensing.

Videos can be custom-branded to include a customers logo directly in the videos, making it their own.

StoryCub has gone #1 in the iTunes “Kids and Family” video podcast section.

Unsolicited, Apple has created a custom “StoryCub” banner and has featured the program on the home page for all podcasts numerous times.

It’s starting to get interesting…Hmmm.

milestones.description: Not long after a beta launch, StoryCub gets it's first #1 in iTunes, beating out Sesame Street, Nickelodeon, and Sprout in the "Kids and Family" section"
milestones.source_description: StoryCub Video Stories For Kids Goes Number One on iTunes

milestones.description: StoryCub confirms over 1 million views of it's StoryCub program.  An early education program, StoryCub introduces parents, kids, and educators to amazing children's picture books via video versions that promote reading and inspire learning.
